name: tekton-pipeline-combo
description: Unified build system for Tekton Pipeline Renderer package and VSCode extension

scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath && process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn') === -1) throw new Error('Please use yarn')"
scripts.clean: yarn workspace tekton-pipeline-renderer run clean && yarn workspace tekton-vscode run clean && rm -rf dist
scripts.build: yarn run build:renderer && yarn run build:vscode
scripts.test: yarn run test:renderer && yarn run test:vscode
scripts.lint: yarn workspace tekton-pipeline-renderer run lint && yarn workspace tekton-vscode run lint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn workspace tekton-pipeline-renderer run lint:fix && yarn workspace tekton-vscode run lint:fix
scripts.ci: yarn run clean && yarn run lint && yarn run test && yarn run build:renderer
scripts.ci:github: yarn run lint && yarn run build:renderer && yarn run build:extension && yarn run vscode:package
scripts.release:check: yarn run ci && yarn run propagate && yarn run build:vscode
scripts.release:prepare: yarn run release:check && yarn run build:extension

author: Your Name
